tool_description: This API uses the World Athletics scoring tables and pulls the marks required for certain point values.
title: Scoring Tables API

api_list.name: /marks/women/{points}
api_list.description: This retrieves the women's marks for the point value given as a parameter (0-1400).

required_parameters.name: points
required_parameters.description: Please enter a number between 1 and 1400.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scoring-tables-api.p.rapidapi.com/marks/women/{points}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scoring-tables-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /marks/women/
api_list.description: This retrieves all women's marks from the World Athletics Scoring Tables.
